comments.body: nit: we can just collect and compare the value without `toPandas` but not a bit deal.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +488,492 @@            agg1 = df.agg(max_udf(df['id']))
            agg2 = self.spark.sql("select max_udf(id) from table")
            assert_frame_equal(agg1.toPandas(), agg2.toPandas())
